title: Self-Rewriting Meta-Prompt Loop

problem.en: Static system prompts become stale or overly brittle as an agent encounters new tasks and edge cases.
problem.ko: 정적 시스템 프롬프트가 에이전트가 새로운 작업과 엣지 케이스를 만날 때 오래되거나 취약해집니다.

solution.en: Let the agent rewrite its own system prompt after each interaction, validating changes before applying them.
solution.ko: 에이전트가 각 상호작용 후 자체 시스템 프롬프트를 재작성하고, 적용 전에 변경 사항을 검증하게 합니다.

mermaid_diagram:
flowchart TD
    A[Run Episode] --> B[Reflect on Dialogue]
    B --> C[Draft Prompt Improvements]
    C --> D{Passes Guardrails?}
    D -->|Yes| E[Update System Prompt]
    D -->|No| F[Reject Changes]
    E --> G[Save to Version Control]
    G --> H[Next Episode]
code_example:
dialogue = run_episode()
delta = LLM('Reflect on dialogue and propose prompt edits', dialogue)
if passes_guardrails(delta):
    system_prompt += delta
    save_version(system_prompt)

en: No human in loop for minor tweaks
